website_summaries.verdict: The wireless Urbanears Stadion earphones have a unique look and feel with a crisp, clear sound, but exercise buffs motivated by big bass might be disappointed.
pros: Solid audio performance with crisp, clear high-mids and highs
cons: Not for those seeking massive bass sound
Eartips don't seal off ear canal

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a month
customer_reviews.text: Earphones reviewed as great for exercising & sealed against perspiration. Price was steep but had already had 2 previous bluetooth earphone sets fail (will charge up but don't switch on). So all is good for 2 months; sound excellent, holding in the ears good. Then go to start my workout & surprise, press the button & they will not turn on. Considered I might have left them on so needed charging; plugged in and left them for half and hour. Come back and light is white. Try to turn on & nothing! Just like the cheap-as-chips earphones they lasted a couple of months but in this case I'm out 80 quid!
customer_reviews.author: P. G. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea in reality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the wife. Sound quality was ok ... nothing special but the elasticated lead idea continually got caught up in her hair and drove her nuts. Not recommended for anyone with longish hair or bobs. Might be fine if you are very good at putting your hair in a pony tail and that's the only time you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cresswell

customer_reviews.title: Frail Product and dreadful vendor
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for gym work. Within a month the product died and would not recharge. Wrote to the vendor who has refused to even respond, Advice: Avoid this product. Buy nothing from this supplier - you'll get zero response. Doubt I'll ever see my money back....
customer_reviews.author: I. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good design and easy to wear. Can’t get volume really high
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stephen J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Connection kept breaking up - Fit was very good though. But connection is the main thing you ...
customer_reviews.text: Connection kept breaking up - Fit was very good though. But connection is the main thing you need on a wireless headphone.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great, firmly held on ears
customer_reviews.text: Great, firmly held on ears, sounds good, never moves. In a busy street, get some breaking up when phone is in hip pocket, but fine when phone is in breast pocket or on arm.
customer_reviews.author: Piran

customer_reviews.title: OK OK Where is the 0 Star option. 3rd pair lasted 2 runs
customer_reviews.text: Awful product that quite simply is not fit for purpuse. I've had 2 pairs now replaced under warranty - 3rd pair lasted halfway through second run then died. Nothing DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The wait for these blue tooth headphones was worth while. Comfy fit in the ear, good sound quality and stayed snug while I jogged. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but difficult to connect up
customer_reviews.text: Struggling to get the headset to connect to the phone
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on the move
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality given the price. Excellent fit and no issues with bluetooth function. Reviews complaining about controls being around the back are nonsensical. Controls are raised and easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Connor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound & quality
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones ideal for cycling as I use them Often and fit in perfectly in your ears 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Zoheb qudoos

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for running
customer_reviews.text: You honestly wouldn’t know you are wearing them. As advertised don’t block out surrounding noise totally for safety but quality of found still great
customer_reviews.author: Lou28

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports headphone I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Best sports headphones I've ever bought. They do not budge once you put them in. I have small ears and struggle to find earphones that fit, but the multiple buds with this are great. Sound is very good and keeps you aware of your surroundings. I got the blue set and the colour is lovely, buttons on the back super easy to use and paired / charged in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Giulia Z

product_meta.title: Urbanears Stadion Bluetooth Sports Earbuds - Black Belt
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black Belt

"Stadion is the performance-ready headset designed to fit as seamlessly as an aerobics leotard.

With its light and stretchy body, and no cords attached, Stadion adapts to everything, from the unique shape of your head to your most intense workouts.

With one less distraction in your headspace, there’s nothing stopping you from getting in the zone and taking your workout to the next level. "



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Stadion Earbuds
feature_bullets: Coils and Earclick - EarClick technology and stretchy coils create the perfect unshakable fit
Wireless - Bluetooth-ready for cord-free listening and hands-free calls
Head Controls - No need to slow down, all of the buttons you need are on the back of your head
Built in Mic - Built-in mic and remote
